aboutUsText: At Zatikyan Physical Therapy, our mission is to help you regain your strength, mobility, and overall health with personalized care. We focus on evidence-based treatments to support your recovery and well-being. Whether you are recovering from an injury or managing chronic pain, we are here to guide you every step of the way.
ourMissionText: Our goal is to empower our patients to live their best lives through compassionate care, skilled treatments, and innovative solutions.

teamMember.name: Anun Ajekyan

contactUsSubtitle: We're here to help. Get in touch with us today!
getInTouchText: Feel free to contact us for any inquiries.
answer1: Physical therapy is a medical treatment that focuses on improving movement and restoring function. It is often used to help people recover from injuries, surgeries, or conditions that affect mobility, strength, and overall physical function.
faq2: How long does a session last?
answer2: Each physical therapy session typically lasts between 30 to 60 minutes, depending on the specific needs of the patient. The length of the session can vary based on the type of treatment required and the progress being made.
faq3: Do I need a referral to see a physical therapist?
answer3: In some cases, you may need a referral from your primary care physician or a specialist to see a physical therapist, depending on your location and insurance requirements.
answer4: Physical therapy involves exercises and treatments designed to improve movement and function. While it can involve some discomfort, especially if you are recovering from an injury or surgery, it should never be excessively painful.
faq5: What should I bring to my first appointment?
answer5: When attending your first physical therapy session, you should bring a few important items with you. These include your ID, insurance card, and any medical records related to your condition.
Improving your health with expert care a: Improving your health with expert care and personalized treatment
